children.markdown:
[![](https://i1.wp.com/photos6.flickr.com/6301443_fbfde67388.jpg?w=960)](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/6301443/ "photo sharing") [Hares in Borough Market](http://www.flickr.com/photos/adders/6301443/), originally uploaded by [Adam Tinworth](http://www.flickr.com/people/adders/).
Some people will find this unsettling, but personally I think it’s good to see the link between animals and meat in such an explicit fashion. The connection has been broken in too many urbanites’ minds.
